teams.name: Mexico
teams.loan_because: we believe in giving people the opportunity to help themselves by promoting businesses and entrepreneurship throughout the world.

teams.name: McGraw Hill Financial
teams.loan_because:
Corporate Responsibility is fundamental to MHFI. It guides who we are, how we conduct ourselves and how we interact with those around us.

Corporate Responsibility Essentials at MHFI encompass:

– Financial Essentials – we help to provide the fundamental financial knowledge that can build better lives, stronger communities and stable economies and financial markets. 

– Community Essentials – we help deploy and foster the resources and skills that lead to smarter, stronger, more inclusive communities. Our employees are integral partners in our dedication to this critical purpose. 

– Environmental Essentials – we offer innovative business services that promote sustainability while applying best practice to reduce the environmental footprint of our operations.
teams.description:
McGraw Hill Financial is a high-growth, high-margin benchmarks, content and analytics company serving the capital and commodity markets. MHFI believes a responsible business is one that delivers value for investors, customers, employees and communities; makes wise use of natural resources; and treats people fairly.

We are home to some of the most iconic brands in finance and business, including: Standard & Poor’s Ratings Services, S&P Capital IQ, S&P Dow Jones Indices, Platts, J.D. Power, and McGraw Hill Construction. Our independent credit ratings, indices, analytics, price assessments and research provide clients with the essential intelligence to manage risk and identify opportunities to grow.

teams.name: Capital One
teams.loan_because:
We like helping small businesses! 

We’re happy to have you on the Capital One Kiva Lending Team, but there’s still more you can do to help. 

You’ve already used Kiva to help a small business using your $25 credit, and now you can give loans by using your rewards.
teams.description:
Clink on the link below to lend using your rewards.

https://capitalonelabs.com/Kiva

teams.name: Chegg
teams.loan_because: Education goes beyond the classroom.  Because we are a community driven to empower others to succeed. And we believe students will not only transform their futures but define ours.
teams.description: We are the Chegg Community. We are students, educators, employees; who all believe that together we can have a greater impact for good.

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: Portugal
teams.loan_because:
Honramos o legado deixado pelos nossos antepassados que espalharam cultura, conhecimento e valores por todo o mundo. Onde há um português, há um amigo pronto a ajudar e dar esperança aos que mais precisam. Isto é Portugal.
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
We honor the legacy of our ancestors who spread our culture, knowledge and values around the world. Wherever there is a Portuguese, there is a friend willing to help and give hope to those in need. This is Portugal.
teams.description: Portuguese Lenders Team

teams.name: Arizona State University (ASU) Students/Alumni
teams.loan_because: We're Devils that care!
teams.description: College students and alumni of ASU who donate to Kiva.org

teams.name: SinglePlatform
teams.loan_because: SinglePlatform is in the business of helping small businesses succeed. It's just what we do.
teams.description: We're fast, fun, high-energy, and entrepreneurial.

teams.name: Kiva Khomota
teams.loan_because: there is no them
teams.description: Khomota Kiva is an association dedicated to promoting the empowerment of the impoverished through effective microfinancing techniques.  All members who decide to join carry the responsibility of promoting microfinancing as a whole and providing whatever sort of donation they can to make their own individual impacts across the world.

teams.name: Team Virginia
teams.loan_because: We give new meaning to the phrase "Commonwealth of Virginia."  We Virginians are thrilled to pool our common resources to help entrepreneurs all over the world as they improve their lives and their communities.
teams.description:
From the Appalachian Mountains to Virginia Beach (and equally welcoming of members outside the state), we are enthusiastic Kiva lenders privileged to have ties to the great state of Virginia.

teams.loan_because:

teams.name: Sweden
teams.description: Sometimes it's easier to see that what a difference we each make by looking at what we do together -- And having more people together might even convince others to join and lend as well. Feel free to join up if you're a Kiva member in Sweden!

teams.name: Saint Joseph's University
teams.loan_because: When the heart is touched by direct experience, the mind may be challenged to change. Personal involvement with innocent suffering, with the injustice others suffer, is the catalyst for solidarity which then gives rise to intellectual inquiry and moral reflection...Students, in the course of their formation, must let the gritty reality of this world into their lives, so they can learn to feel it, think about it critically, respond to its suffering and engage it constructively. They should learn to perceive, think, judge, choose and act for the rights of others, especially the disadvantaged and the oppressed. --by Peter-Hans Kolvenbach, SJ, from "The Service of Faith and the Promotion of Justice in American Jesuit Higher Education"
teams.description: A Jesuit university committed to social justice.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: KivaFriends.org
teams.loan_because: we are a diverse group of people with diverse reasons for participating on Kiva.org, but with a unifying desire to alleviate poverty around the world through making microloans to the hard working poor.
teams.description: We are a community for lenders by lenders. We welcome Kiva.org lenders to participate in our lender forums at KivaFriends.org

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.name: Google
teams.loan_because: It's not evil!
teams.description: A group of Google employees

teams.name: Green Partnerships
teams.loan_because: We want to help create more sustainable and equitable communities all around the world.
teams.description:
We lend to individuals and groups engaged in businesses and services that help them earn a living but also help to protect the environment in their part of the world. We also strive to build green partnerships in our own communities by supporting the women and men who provide businesses, services, and products that benefit people and the Earth. 

Some of our team members mainly fund green loans, while others choose to designate a fraction of their loans to green enterprises. These are examples of just some of the loans Green Partnerships has helped to fund:

teams.name: Virginia Tech
teams.loan_because: "Ut Prosim" - That I May Serve.  This is the motto of the university, and it is something that students/alumni come to understand as a dedication to service--a duty to think beyond oneself.  Kiva is a way that we show we're truly "Hokie Proud."
teams.description: Founded in 1872 as a land-grant college named Virginia Agricultural and Mechanical College, Virginia Tech is now a comprehensive, innovative research university with the largest full-time student population in Virginia.  The Kiva team is made up of students, faculty, alumni, and fans of this great school!

teams.name: LOTUS: Lend Out To Uplift Self-sufficiency
teams.loan_because: We care about people striving to enhance their economic self-sufficiency and wish to support their entrepreneurial endeavors. It just takes one small step by each of us lending on kiva. Together we can make it easier for hard working people to get the much-needed capital to sustain and grow their business. We feel blessed to be able to support the aspirations of so many loan recipients who persevere tenaciously for a better quality of life with dignity. Kudos to Kiva.org that allows us to connect for this common cause.
teams.description:
In our team, we have a vision to change lives in novel ways. Our team's origin began with a Kiva Card (gift certificate) whose recipient founded this team. Inspired by Kiva Fellow, Jessica Heinzelman's talk, our founder dreamed to take us on a cruise, beyond the realm of lending targets and team statistics. Frequent & occasional lenders are free to choose who to lend to, how much and when in an amiable team ambience nurtured by Kiva Fellows, Kiva Editor & Translators, artists, writers, entrepreneurs, workers, retired people, families, parent + kid(s), students, teachers, and professionals. Our diversity & portfolio enable our discovery of social values inherent in the Kiva micro-lending ecosystem whose issues we debate objectively. Experienced members are gratified to enhance our grasp of nuances in lending. We wish to work with volunteers in the team, Kiva Friends, http://kivafriends.org and our supporters to engage in activities that promote Kiva. Our journey to strengthen and grow the Kiva ecosystem has room for more. JOIN NOW, and check out our team, to convince yourself that it can be your team too.

LINKS TO SEE ALSO:
1. Kiva Updates:http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva 
2. KF Blogs:http://www.kiva.org/updates/fellows 

(Thanks Anh D Pham for letting LOTUS team on Kiva to use the exquisite image of the lotus flower you photographed in Vietnam)

teams.loan_because: We love helping others.
teams.description: Players from the iOS game Wallabee who have banded together to help others.

teams.name: Jewish Donors and Friends
teams.loan_because: If we can, this is the right thing to do!
teams.description: A group consisting of Jewish donors and those who feel close to Jewish values.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

teams.name: Karma Police
teams.loan_because: we want to promote the benefits around giving within our community and we want to see an end to poverty.
teams.description: a social enterprise dedicated towards promoting giving within the community and business sector.

teams.name: Kiva Kiwis
teams.loan_because: Because Kiwis know what it is to pull yourself  up by your bootstraps.
teams.description: Started in Oamaru New Zealand by a group of friends wanting to encourage and to make it easy for Kiwis to make loans through Kiva.

teams.name: ASR
teams.loan_because: We feel fortunate to live and work in a great city, province and country and are happy to help others.
teams.description: Staff members at the Association of Saskatchewan REALTORS® based in Saskatoon.  We work hard and have a lot of fun at the office and are all involved in various community activities.

teams.name: Avalanche Fund
teams.loan_because: We trust in acting together!
teams.description: We were two when we started. Now we are a real avalanche. We are friends. We are co-workers. We are all those that do not stop at nothing to help the idea of micro-finance grow. Join the avalanche!

teams.name: Dermalogica
teams.loan_because:
NEWS! In honor of International Women's Day, if you join our team, then make a loan and credit our team, we'll match your loan with one of our own!!*

We believe in the multiplier effect of supplying capital to women - supporting a woman in opening or growing a business enables her to buy food and housing for her family, send her children to school, and contribute to the welfare of her community.  We want to help put more women on the road to Financial Independence Through Entrepreneurship. Join the FITE!
* We'll match up to 3,000 loans.
teams.description: Dermalogica is the number one line of skin care products for professional skin therapists and consumers worldwide.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: Kiva Capitalists
teams.loan_because: Capital and business make the world go round; trade is a stabilizing force. Offering non-usurious loans to help people start businesses to provide others with goods and services they need or want is what capitalism is all about. We are all proud capitalists, and some of us are even unrepentant.
teams.description: Free markets, free minds. Hayek, Mises, Friedman.

teams.name: pam and aileen say yes
teams.loan_because: we're celebrating Pam & Aileen's wedding on 21 December 2013
teams.description: we are two women from Troon in Scotland who are getting married on 21 December 2013. This 'team' is to allow our guests to give a kiva loan in our names, if they'd like to!

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: España - Spain
teams.loan_because: Kiva ofrece un medio ideal para participar activamente en el apoyo a emprendedores sin recursos que no pueden acceder a los canales normales de financiación y que, gracias a los micro-créditos, pueden  desarrollar una actividad empresarial que les permita, a ellos y su entorno, alcanzar una mejor calidad de vida.
teams.description:
Este club se creó con la intención inicial de fomentar la participación de españolas y españoles en Kiva, no obstante,  está abierto a todas las personas que deseen unirse a él, sin importar su nacionalidad ni ninguna otra condición.
 
El único referente identitario de este grupo es la solidaridad y la convicción de que, a través de Kiva, es posible el apoyo a personas o grupos emprendedores que buscan y merecen una oportunidad por su esfuerzo.

teams.name: Sunset Casino
teams.loan_because:
Kleinstkredite sind ein ideales Werkzeug bei der Hilfe zur Selbsthilfe.
Damit geben wir Menschen die Möglichkeit sich selbst aus der Armut zu befreien und ihre Familien zu ernähren.
teams.description:
Wir hoffen, dass sehr viele unserer Spieler bei diesem Team mitmachen und damit vielen Menschen ein Schritt in die richtige Richtung ermöglicht wird.
Danke
Paul

teams.name: Powerful Women
teams.loan_because: Micro financing was founded by Muhammad Yunus with the goal to empower women around the globe. We want to contribute to that goal in any way we can.
teams.description: Powerful Women is a team of both women and men in support of financing women all over the world so that they can provide a better standard of living for their family, community, and future.

teams.name: WordPress
teams.loan_because:
Loaning is good for the world as far as we know. 

In this group we also like the open-source website software WordPress. 

Maybe we make a good living using it as professionals and want to give it props for the fact that we can invest in Kiva, or maybe you just want a WordPress badge in your profile cause its nice.
teams.description:
We are fans of a web-based program that lets you build sites easily. The program is Free Software which means it doesn't cost anything and is produced by a community instead of a company. 

Some of us might be website producers, while others are bloggers or businesspeople who use the software for their own websites. 

WordPress has sharing and co-operation as core principles of its development and community.

teams.name: Team Socorro
teams.loan_because: We believe that providing assistance to those in need can often provide the jump start needed for people to excel in their endeavors.
teams.description: "Socorro" is Spanish for help or aid, and is the city name of a town in New Mexico where many of the team members live.  Socorro is a community known for providing assistance to those in need.

teams.name: Kiva Khomota
teams.loan_because: there is no them
teams.description: Khomota Kiva is an association dedicated to promoting the empowerment of the impoverished through effective microfinancing techniques.  All members who decide to join carry the responsibility of promoting microfinancing as a whole and providing whatever sort of donation they can to make their own individual impacts across the world.
